- **Excess Federal Property Holdings Utah**  
  [Data](https://opendata.utah.gov/resource/8u8w-hhfg.json) | [Meta](https://opendata.utah.gov/api/views/8u8w-hhfg) | Last update: Apr 2019  
  This data set contains buildings and structures in Utah currently designated as excess owned by the federal government. Every excess asset taken off the books represents progress in the form of reduced operating and maintenance expenses.

The first record for each sex & year of birth has rank 1, the second record has rank 2, and so forth.
